marklogic.body: dude, so true. the new isn't much to rave about if you ask me.. yes ill admit.. it has one killer display , but as far as the TFP's screen is concerned, ours is really nice too. aside from the most minor screen Bleed i encounter ( which the 2 had as well) you cant even notice unless its max brightness on a black background..PLUS. we a dedicated dock that charges our tablet and gives us a really handy USB port. oh yeah' don't forget we get a micro SD card reader on the TFP and one more on the dock so you could easily add 64 + Gb to your storage... and we can overclock up to 1.6-1.7 Ghz ... four 1.6 cores is insane... not to mention the dev community who improves the user experience everyday! CAN YOUR IPAD DO THAT? I didn't THINK SO!
